name: Mimic Saloon
description: Inspired by the wanted posters that were common in the Wild West, our team decided to make an asymetrical party game. One player plays as the sheriff trying to catch the doers of a bank robbery and keep the bounty for himself. The other three players are the bandits: their lives are currency... litterally. They sought refuge in a nerby saloon but now they're trapped inside and must escape before the sheriff finds them!
